title: Citibank Introduces the First Visa Infinite Card, the Most Exclusive Within the Colombian Market
summary: Bogota, Colombia – Providing continuous research and development of innovative products to satisfy the needs and lifestyle of its clients, Citibank-Colombia introduces the first Visa Infinite credit card into the market, in alliance with Avianca LifeMiles and the Platinum Avianca LifeMiles card.
tag-1: Citibank Introduces the First Visa Infinite Card, the Most Exclusive Within the Colombian Market
tag-3: Bogota, Colombia – Providing continuous research and development of innovative products to satisfy the needs and lifestyle of its clients, Citibank-Colombia introduces the first Visa Infinite credit card into the market, in alliance with Avianca LifeMiles and the Platinum Avianca LifeMiles card.
tag-4: The first Visa Infinite card in the Colombian market delivers exclusive offers to clients, including:
tag-6: While using these cards, clients earn 1.5 LifeMiles miles per dollar spent or its Colombian Pesos equivalent during the first six months, with one LifeMiles mile per dollar spent afterwards. With TACA Avianca purchases, clients earn two miles per dollar spent. They also provide the personal assistant service to help clients on booking flights, car rental, restaurants locations and special gifts shopping.
tag-7: "Citibank Colombia keeps working on the development of innovative financial products and services to meet our clients' needs, while offering more comfort and ease of use for transactions and splendid benefits for their lifestyle. The alliance with Avianca LifeMiles is designed to offer our clients an exclusive brand experience," said Mauricio Fonseca, vice president Products and Segments, Consumer Bank, Citibank Colombia.
tag-8: For additional information, please visit www.citi.com.co.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
